00173 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00174 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::IsEmpty() const
00175 {
00176        return m_sizes.IsSizeEmpty();

00208 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00209 inline int TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetSize(int dimension) const
00210 {
00211        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00212        I_ASSERT(dimension < Dimensions);

00218 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00219 inline const Element& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetAt(const IndexType& index) const
00220 {
00221        I_ASSERT(index.IsInside(m_sizes));
00222 
00223        int elementIndex = GetElementIndex(index);
00224        I_ASSERT(elementIndex < int(m_elements.size()));
00225 
00226        return m_elements[elementIndex];
00227 }

00287 // inline protected methods
00288 
00289 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00290 inline int TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetElementIndex(const IndexType& index) const
00291 {
00292        int elementIndex = 0;
00293        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00294        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00295               I_ASSERT(index[i] >= 0);
00296               I_ASSERT(index[i] < m_sizes[i]);
00297 
00298               elementIndex += index[i] * cumulatedSizes;
00299 
00300               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00301        }
00302 
00303        return elementIndex;
00304 }

00309 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00310 TArray<Element, Dimensions>::TArray()
00311 {
00312        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00313               m_sizes[i] = 0;
00314        }
00315 }

00334 template <class Element, int Dimensions>

00338 
00339        UpdateElementsSize();

00359 // protected methods
00360 
00361 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00362 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::UpdateElementsSize()
00363 {
00364        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00365        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00366               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00367        }
00368 
00369        m_elements.resize(cumulatedSizes);
00370 }
00371 
00372 
00373 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00374 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::DeepCopy(const Elements& elements, const SizesType& sizes)
00375 {
00376        I_ASSERT(int(elements.size()) == sizes[0] * sizes[1]);
00377 
00378        m_elements = elements;
00379        m_sizes = sizes;
00380 }

00398 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00399 const Element& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator*() const
00400 {

00402        I_ASSERT(IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes()));
00403 
00404        return m_arrayPtr->GetAt(*this);

00438 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00439 typename TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator++()
00440 {
00441        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !Increase(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00442               m_arrayPtr = NULL;
00443        }
00444 
00445        return *this;
00446 }

00466               m_arrayPtr = NULL;

00494 
00495 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00496 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator==(const Iterator& iterator) const
00497 {
00498        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && (iterator.m_arrayPtr != NULL)){
00499               return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr) && (BaseClass::operator==(iterator));
00500        }
00501 
00502        return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr);
00503 }

00515 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00516 TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::Iterator(TArray* arrayPtr)
00517 :      BaseClass(0), m_arrayPtr(arrayPtr)
00518 {
00519        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00520               m_arrayPtr = NULL;   // if it is not inside of array set it directly to the end iterator state
